required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Tear Film Stability of DAILIES® AquaComfort Plus® Contact Lenses vs. MyDay® Daily Disposable Contact Lenses
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Pre-Lens Tear Film Stability With Daily Disposable Contact Lenses Using Ring Mire Projection

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate tear film stability of DAILIES® AquaComfort Plus® (DACP) compared to MyDay® after 12 hours of lens wear.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean Time Post-blink to 15% Distortion of the Projected Rings After 12 Hours of Lens Wear
primary_outcome.description: The participant blinked twice, then kept eye open. Circular images were projected onto tear film layer located on the surface of the contact lens. Measuring software automatically detected areas where the tear film destabilized after the blink. The time to 15% destabilization of the tear film was calculated. A longer time indicates a more stable tear film. The right eye was evaluated.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Speed of Tear Film Break-up at 15 Seconds Post-blink After 12 Hours of Lens Wear
secondary_outcome.description: The participant blinked twice, then kept eye open. Circular images were projected onto tear film layer located on the surface of the contact lens. Measuring software automatically detected areas where the tear film destabilized after the blink. The slope of the regression line (distorted areas vs. time) was calculated. A slower speed (higher number) indicates a more stable tear film. The right eye was evaluated.

arm_group.description: Nelfilcon A contact lenses worn in Period 1, with stenfilcon A contact lenses in Period 2. Each product worn bilaterally for 12 hours over 1 day.
Stenfilcon A contact lenses worn in Period 1, with nelfilcon A contact lenses in Period 2. Each product worn bilaterally for 12 hours over 1 day.

overall_official.last_name: Global Medical Affairs, Clinical Manager, Vision Care

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Subjects were recruited from 1 investigational site located in Germany.

group.title: DACP/MyDay
group.description: Nelfilcon A contact lenses worn in Period 1, followed by stenfilcon A contact lenses in Period 2

group.title: MyDay/DACP
group.description: Stenfilcon A contact lenses worn in Period 1, followed by nelfilcon A contact lenses in Period 2

participants_list.participants: One participant discontinued between Period 1 and Period 2 due to availability

baseline.population: This analysis group includes all enrolled participants.

group.title: Overall
group.description: Nelfilcon A and stenfilcon A contact lenses worn for 12 hours each in Period 1 and 2 as randomized

outcome.title: Mean Time Post-blink to 15% Distortion of the Projected Rings After 12 Hours of Lens Wear
outcome.description: The participant blinked twice, then kept eye open. Circular images were projected onto tear film layer located on the surface of the contact lens. Measuring software automatically detected areas where the tear film destabilized after the blink. The time to 15% destabilization of the tear film was calculated. A longer time indicates a more stable tear film. The right eye was evaluated.
outcome.population: This analysis population includes all randomized subjects who did not meet the critical deviation criteria as specified in the Deviations and Evaluability Plan.

measure.title: Mean Time Post-blink to 15% Distortion of the Projected Rings After 12 Hours of Lens Wear
measure.description: The participant blinked twice, then kept eye open. Circular images were projected onto tear film layer located on the surface of the contact lens. Measuring software automatically detected areas where the tear film destabilized after the blink. The time to 15% destabilization of the tear film was calculated. A longer time indicates a more stable tear film. The right eye was evaluated.
measure.population: This analysis population includes all randomized subjects who did not meet the critical deviation criteria as specified in the Deviations and Evaluability Plan.

outcome.title: Mean Speed of Tear Film Break-up at 15 Seconds Post-blink After 12 Hours of Lens Wear
outcome.description: The participant blinked twice, then kept eye open. Circular images were projected onto tear film layer located on the surface of the contact lens. Measuring software automatically detected areas where the tear film destabilized after the blink. The slope of the regression line (distorted areas vs. time) was calculated. A slower speed (higher number) indicates a more stable tear film. The right eye was evaluated.
outcome.population: This analysis population includes all randomized subjects who did not meet the critical deviation criteria as specified in the Deviations and Evaluability Plan.

measure.description: The participant blinked twice, then kept eye open. Circular images were projected onto tear film layer located on the surface of the contact lens. Measuring software automatically detected areas where the tear film destabilized after the blink. The slope of the regression line (distorted areas vs. time) was calculated. A slower speed (higher number) indicates a more stable tear film. The right eye was evaluated.

reported_events.time_frame: Adverse events were collected for the duration of the study (March 2014 to April 2014). This analysis population includes all participants/eyes exposed to any investigational product evaluated in this study.
reported_events.desc: An adverse event was defined as any untoward medical occurrence, unintended disease or injury, or untoward clinical sign in subjects, users or other persons, whether or not related to the medical device.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Sponsor reserves the right of prior review of any publication or presentation of information related to the study.

clinical_results.limitations_and_caveats: There was a high censoring rate observed with the objective measurements and therefore there are limitations to the conclusions that may be drawn.

point_of_contact.name_or_title: Global Medical Affairs Brand Lead - Vision Care
